directions: Boil rice in water in a 1 1/2-quart heavy saucepan, uncovered and undisturbed, until steam holes appear on surface, about 8 minutes.
Reduce heat to very low and cook, covered and undisturbed, 12 minutes more.
Stir in cream, sugar, vanilla, and salt and simmer, stirring, 2 minutes.
Stir 1 cup fruit into pudding and serve topped with remaining fruit.
ingredients: 2 cups diced mixed fresh tropical fruits such as pineapple, mango, and papaya
title: Creamy Rice Pudding with Tropical Fruits
